entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 6. POP 30%
